title: Create personalized insights provider
description:
Create Riverpod provider for personalized insights:
- insightsProvider that reads current VAT measurement
- Filter/prioritize tips based on user's risk category
- Sort risks by relevance to user's VAT level
- Provide personalized summary text based on risk level
- Consider user's trend (improving vs worsening) for tip prioritization

title: Add tips section to InsightsScreen
description:
Add the reduction tips section to InsightsScreen:
- Section header 'Ways to Reduce Visceral Fat'
- List of HealthTipCard widgets organized by category
- Categories: Physical Activity, Diet, Lifestyle, Sleep & Stress
- Each tip shows title, description, and evidence source
- Tips are shown based on user's current risk level

title: Support different locales and units (metric/imperial)
description: Allow users to switch between metric (kg/cm) and imperial (lb/in) units. Support different date formats based on locale.

title: Create health insights data models
description:
Define data models for health risks and tips:
- HealthRisk model (id, category, title, description, severity, sources)
- HealthTip model (id, category, title, description, icon, ageRange, evidenceSource)
- RiskCategory enum (cardiometabolic, inflammation, liver, metabolic_syndrome, etc.)
- TipCategory enum (diet, activity, lifestyle, sleep, alcohol, smoking)
- Create static data provider with all risks and tips from VISCERAL_FAT_RISKS_AND_TIPS.md
